createdAt.description: The date that this SDK was installed.

identifier.description: A unique identifier of the API. This'll be used to do imports on `@api/<identifier>` and also where the SDK code will be located in `.api/apis/<identifier>`

installerVersion.description: The version of `api` that was used to install this SDK.

integrity.description: An integrity hash that will be used to determine on `npx api update` calls if the API has changed since the SDK was last generated.

private.description: Was this SDK installed as a private, unpublished, package to the filesystem?

source.description: The original source that was used to generate the SDK with.

updatedAt.description: The date that this SDK was last rebuilt or updated.
